details:
adjective
- causing dejection
= synonyms: dark
- bad
= synonyms: pitiful, distressing, lamentable, sad, deplorable
- feeling or expressing regret or sorrow or a sense of loss over something done or undone
= synonyms: bad, regretful
- without merit
= example: without merit
= synonyms: no-good, good-for-nothing, good-for-naught, meritless, no-account, no-count, unmeritorious
